K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:251a-15: lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe ma snad cing ma nyams la bde bar yongs su thar par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:251a-17: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag chos bzhi dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:251a-18: lnga brgya ba tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe ma snad cing ma smas la bde bar yongs su thar par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:251b-0: thos @251b pa nyung ba'i sems can yongs su spong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:251b-2: bas mtha'i gnas mal la brten pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:251b-3: bdag dul ba dang zhib dang zhi gnas kyi sbyor ba la brtson pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:251b-4: byams pa; byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:251b-5: lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe ma snad cing ma smas la bde bar yongs su thar par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:251b-7: de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe ma snad cing ma smas la bde bar yongs su thar par 'gyur bar 'dod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:251b-8: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par byed par 'dod pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:251b-11: nags dang; bas mtha' la gnas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:251b-12: sems can rig pa med cing mi brtson pa yongs su spang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:251b-13: bdag gi 'khrul pa la rtog cing gzhan gyi 'khrul pa mi tshol ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:251b-14: mi smra ba la dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:251b-15: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par dga' bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:251b-16: gal te de la sems can gzhan dag la brda sprad par 'dod pa'i sems skyes na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:251b-17: des zang zing med pa'i sems la gnas te chos kyi sbyin pa byin par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252a-0: nyi shu po 'di dag ni zang zing med pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa rnyed pa dang bkur sti mi 'dod par chos kyi sbyin @252a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252a-1: pa byin pa gang yin pa de'i phan yon yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252a-4: dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252a-5: blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252a-6: blo dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252a-7: brtan pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252a-8: shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252a-9: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab rjes su rtog par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252a-11: zhe sdang chung bar 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252a-12: gti mug chung bar 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252a-13: bdud kyis de la glags mi rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252a-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dgongs par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252a-15: mi ma yin pa rnams de la bsrung bar 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252a-16: lha rnams de la gzi byin bskyed par 'gyur ba dang; mi mdza' ba rnams kyis de la glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252a-17: de'i mja' [*mdza] bshes rnams mi phyed par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252a-19: des mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252a-20: yid bde ba mang bar 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252a-21: mkhas pas bsngags par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252a-22: de'i chos kyi sbyin par de yang rjes su dran par bya bar 'os par 'gyur ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252a-24: nyi shu po de dag ni zang zing med pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa rnyed pa dang bkur sti yongs su spangs shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252b-0: gos dang zas la re ba med par phan pa'i dngos po sngon du 'gro @252b pa'i sems kyis rgyun mi 'chad par yang dang yang du chos kyi sbyin pa byin pa gang yin pa de'i phan yon yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252b-2: zang zing med pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa la gzhan yang phan yon nyi shu yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252b-4: de'i spobs pa ma skyes ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252b-5: de'i spobs pa skyes pa chud mi za bar 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252b-6: gzungs thob par bya ba'i phyir de'i sems drang por 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252b-7: tshegs chung ngus sems can mang po dag gi don byed par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252b-8: tshegs chung ngus sems can rnams de la gus par byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252b-9: rim gro byed par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252b-10: lus kyi sdom pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252b-11: ngag gi sdom pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252b-12: yid kyi sdom pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252b-13: ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa las 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252b-14: rab tu dga' bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252b-15: phas gyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun pas tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252b-16: de'i gzi brjid sems can rigs mthon po dag gis kyang mi bzod na phal pa dag gis lta ci smos pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252b-17: dbang po zil gyis mi non par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252b-18: lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252b-19: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:252b-20: dka' ba spyad pa dag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:253a-0: brtson 'grus brtsams pa las yongs su nyams @253a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:253a-2: dam pa'i chos kun du srung bar 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:253a-3: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa myur du non par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:253a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la mthun par gnas par 'gyur ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:253a-6: nyi shu po de dag ni zang zing med pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'i phan yon yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:253a-8: phyi ma'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i zang zing dang bcas pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa la ches yi rang bar 'gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:253a-9: zang zing med pa la ni ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:253a-10: shes rab 'chal bar gyur pa de dag la ltos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:253a-11: de dag 'di ltar mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:253a-12: slong mo ster ba'i khyim la brten cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:253a-13: ji ltar bdag la dad cing bkur stir byed par 'gyur snyam pa'i sems de lta bus chos kyi sbyin pa byin par byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:253a-14: de dag gis zang zing med pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa bor nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:253a-20: yo byad kyi phyir gzhan dag la chos ston par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:253a-24: mi la la zhig la khyi ro'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:253a-29: mnam po zhig mgul bar btags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:253a-30: gtsang spra 'dod pa'i phyir ngo tsha zhing mi dga' la yongs su spong bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:253b-0: de bzhin du de dag zang zing med pa'i chos kyi sbyin @253b pas ngo tsha zhing mi dga' bar byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:253b-1: mnog med par shes nas skyo ste 'dor zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:253b-2: gang gi phyir bdag cag la gos dang zas mi sbyin par sems pas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:253b-3: bdag cag gi chos kyi sbyin pa ni don med pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:253b-4: bdag cag ni 'di na don med par mi dga' zhing 'dug go zhes zer nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:253b-5: de dag lus brgyan pa ched cher bya ba'i phyir slob ma sdud par byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:253b-6: sems can bsdu ba ched cher bya ba'i phyir ni ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:253b-7: de dag 'di skad du bdag cag ni snying rje bas 'khor sdud par byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:253b-8: bdag cag la ni bsnyen bkur byed pa ci yang dgos pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:253b-9: bdag cag ni phan pa'i dngos pos sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:253b-14: rgyal po'i pho brang dag tu 'gro bar zad do zhes skye bo mang po de dag shes par byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:253b-15: de dag gi sems ni gos dang zas la song bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:253b-17: nga ni sems zang zing dang bcas pa la sems can yongs su smin par byed pa zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:253b-19: de ni bdag nyid kyang yongs su ma smin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:253b-20: sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa lta ci smos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:253b-21: gnas 'di ni thob par sla ba'i ngo bo ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254a-0: nga ni bsnyen bkur lhur len cing lus kyi bsnyen bkur gyi bde ba'i sbags pas sbags par gyur pa la phan pa'i @254a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254a-1: dngos po nyid du mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254a-3: de ni lus la bde bar bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'khor sdud par byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254a-4: nan tan du bsgrub pa la gnas pa'i phyir ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254a-6: nga ni tshul 'chos pa la dgon pa na gnas pa zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254a-7: nga ni bsod nams chung du la 'dod pa chung ba zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254a-8: nga ni kha zas bzang po 'dod pa la bsod snyoms pa zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254a-9: nga ni gos sdug gu 'dod pa la phyag dar khrod pa zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254a-10: nga ni khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang 'dres pa la ma 'dzings pa zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254a-11: nga ni g-yo sgyu can la sangs rgyas byung ba dang phrad pa zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254a-12: nga ni gzhan gyi 'khrul pa tshol ba la rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254a-13: nga ni khong khro ba mang ba la tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254a-14: nga ni nga rgyal can la mang du thos pa zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254a-15: nga ni phyogs 'dzin pa la 'dul ba 'dzin pa zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254a-16: nga ni rgod pa la chos smra ba zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254a-17: nga ni khyim pa dang 'dres pa la zhal ta byed pa yongs su dag pa zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254a-18: nga ni yon gnas dam pa la zang zing med par yongs su gtong ba zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254a-19: nga ni lan du phan 'dogs su re ba la bsdu ba'i dngos po zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254a-20: nga ni rnyed pa dang bkur sti la chags pa la lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254b-0: nga @254b ni ma dad pa mang ba la rab tu byung ba zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254b-1: nga ni pha rol la shes par byed pa la bslab pa 'dod pa zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254b-2: nga ni ma gus pa la chos sbyin pa zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254b-3: nga ni 'jig rten pa'i gsang sngags la brtson pa la chos la dga' ba zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254b-4: nga ni stong pa nyid la ma brtson pa la nges par 'byung ba zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254b-5: nga ni mngon par mi sgrub pa la las mngon par 'du byed pa zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254b-6: nga ni de mi sgrub pa la byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254b-7: nga ni dmigs pa can la mngon par rtogs pa zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254b-8: nga ni mthu med pa la bzod pa yongs su rdzogs pa zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254b-9: nga ni ma gces pa la bzod pa'i stobs kyi go cha zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254b-10: nga ni rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags chung ba la tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa dka' ba byed pa zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254b-11: nga ni sbyor ba la mi gnas pa la ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254b-12: nga ni lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa la log par ltung bar 'gro ba zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254b-13: nga ni shes rab spyod pa la 'dzings par spyod pa zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254b-14: nga ni thabs dang ldan par gyur pa la g-yo sgyu can zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254b-15: nga ni rnyed pa dang bkur sti mi 'dod pa la brdzun du smra ba zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:254b-16: nga ni bar ma dor gnas pa la chos spong ba zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255a-0: nga ni dam pa'i chos kun srung bar 'dod pa la lus dang srog la chags @255a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255a-2: nga ni sems zhum pa la nga rgyal med pa zhes mi smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255a-4: g-yo sgyu'i tshig gang dag lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpa' rnams dmu rgod du 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255a-5: gang dag byang chub sems dpas khong du chud par bya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255a-6: khong du chud nas kyang yongs su spang bar bya ba ni de dag yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255a-9: ci byang chub sems dpa' drug cu po 'di dag nyi tshe las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs par 'gyur ram /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255a-10: 'on te gzhan dag kyang bsgribs par 'gyur lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255a-11: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255a-14: lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpa' phal cher las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255a-15: de dag las byang chub sems dpa' kha cig ni las kyi sgrib pa zad par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255a-16: kha cig ni 'phel bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255a-18: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' drug cu po 'di dag las byang chub sems dpa' nyi shu las kyi sgrib pa chung zhing; las kyi sgrib pa phra ba lnga brgya pa tha ma la skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255a-21: rigs chen po sna tshogs dag tu mkhas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255b-1: shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255b-3: phan pa'i dngos po phun sum tshogs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255b-5: mdzes pa blta na sdug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255b-8: spyod pa brtan pa dag tu 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255b-9: de dag rigs sna tshogs las rab tu byung nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255b-10: bskal pa grangs med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub pa 'di kun tu srung zhing 'dzin par byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255b-11: lus dang srog dang yang bsdos nas dgon pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255b-13: bas mtha'i gnas mal bsten cing rnyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255b-15: rtag tu brtson cing rab tu brtson la sems can gyi spyod pa la 'jug pa la mkhas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255b-16: gsang sngags dang bstan bcos la mkhas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255b-19: spobs pa chags pa med pa dag tu 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255b-20: gzungs mi zad pa thob pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255b-21: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor bzhi po dag la chos ston cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255b-22: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255b-23: dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255b-24: lung du bstan pa'i sde dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255b-25: tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255b-26: ched du brjod pa'i sde dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255b-28: rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255b-29: de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255b-30: skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255b-31: shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:255b-32: rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:256a-1: pa bstan pa'i mdo sde dag la spobs par 'gyur ro //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:256a-5: mkhan po che ge mo zhig las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag gis kun chub par byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:256a-6: zhes brjod cing skyes bu dam pa de dag gi sems kun nas dkris te 'dug par mi 'gyur ro //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:256b-13: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:269b-5: nyes pa 'di 'dra de dag rtogs gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:269b-6: mkhas pa su zhig rmugs gnyid dga' bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:269b-7: shin tu gti mug lta ba mang po'i rgyu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:269b-8: don bzang dam chos yon tan chud gson pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:269b-9: gnyid 'di brtson 'grus 'phrog par rtogs gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:269b-10: mkhas pa yon tan ldan pa su der dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:269b-11: sdug bsngal kun dang mun pa sel byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:269b-12: ngan song yongs su spong ba'i gzhir gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:269b-13: sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa'i brtson 'grus 'phags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:269b-14: gang yin de ni rtag tu brten pa bgyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:269b-15: 'jig rten 'di na bzo gang ci yod dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:269b-16: 'jig rten 'das bzo gang dag ci yod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:269b-17: brtson 'grus brtsams la rnyed par mi dka' na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:269b-18: mkhas pa su dag brtson 'grus stobs kyis skyo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:269b-19: gang dag sangs rgyas byang chub zhugs gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:269b-20: de dag rmugs gnyid skyon rnams mthong nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:269b-21: rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom la gnas par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:269b-22: 'di ni nga yis de dag bskul byas yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:269b-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:269b-25: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag rmugs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:270a-1: dag thos nas spong bar mi bgyid cing skyo bar mi bgyid pa de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:270a-2: brtson 'grus rtsom pa mi bskyed pa de dag de tsam du rmongs par 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:270a-4: byang chub sems dpa' slob par 'tshal ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:270a-5: lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba su zhig yang dag pa'i gnas 'di lta bu 'di dag thos na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:270a-6: le lo bgyid cing dge ba'i chos rnams bskyed par mi bgyid /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:270a-7: brtson 'grus kyi yon tan dang; phan yon 'di lta bu thos na byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du zhig brtson 'grus rtsom par mi bgyid de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:270a-8: de bzhin gshegs pas gnyid la dga' ba'i nongs dmigs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:270a-9: brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i phan yon 'di dag legs par bka' stsal lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:270a-11: byang chub sems dpas las la dga' zhing 'jig rten pa'i spags pas spags pa'i nongs dmigs ji ltar brtag par bgyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:270a-12: byang chub sems dpas gang dag la brtags na 'dod pa chung zhing bgyi ba nyung la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:270a-13: dam pa'i chos btsal ba'i slad du rtag tu brtson zhing sbyor ba la gnas par 'gyur ba lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:270a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:270b-0: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' @270b sems dpa' chen pos las la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs nyi shur brtag par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:270b-1: byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rtog na 'dod pa chung zhing bya ba nyung la dam pa'i chos btsal ba'i slad du rtag tu brtson zhing skyo ba la gnas par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:270b-4: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' las la dga' ba 'jig rten pa'i las rnams la brtson par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:270b-5: las ngan pa thams cad la gnas par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:270b-7: kha ton la brtson pa dag gis brnyas par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:270b-8: nang du yang dag 'jog la dga' ba rnams kyis smad par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:270b-9: 'khor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i las brtsams par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:270b-10: bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa rnams kyi yon sbyong bar mi byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:270b-11: de'i sems dngos por 'dzin pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:270b-12: chags pa mang bar 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:270b-13: khyim so rnams la rgyun du sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:270b-14: dbang byed par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:270b-15: bzlog byed kyi ngang tshul can yid smon mang po la rgyun du gnas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:270b-16: khyim gyi bya ba dag la brtson pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:270b-17: de ro dag la shas cher 'dun cing chags pa bskyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:270b-18: len pa med par mi dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:270b-19: kun nas mnar sems mang ba'i las kyi sgrib pa rgyun du mngon par 'du byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271a-2: de'i zas kyi rnam par rtog pas nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271a-3: 'jig rten pa'i bya ba dag gi rgyun du 'dri bar byed pa dang; mi rigs pa'i smra ba dag la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271a-4: zhal ta byed pa'i rgyags pas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dbang phyug gis tshar gcod par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271a-5: pha rol gyi 'khrul pa la rtog cing bdag gi 'khrul pa la mi rtog par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271a-6: don dang ldan zhing rnam par nges pa'i gtam dag la skyo nas brnyas par 'gyur ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271a-8: nyi shu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' las la dga' zhing zhal te byed pa'i spags pas spags pa'i nyes dmigs yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271a-9: byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rtog na 'dod pa chung zhing bya ba nyung bar 'gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271a-10: 'jig rten pa'i bya ba spangs nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bya ba la brtson par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271a-11: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271a-12: de ni las ngan dag la gnas 'gyur zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271a-13: las mchog dag las de ni rgyang yang ring //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271a-14: 'dir ni rnyed pa che las ring bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271a-15: rnam par chags sems nyes pa 'di dag yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271a-16: dge slong lung nod kha ton dga' rnams kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271a-17: de la brnyes zhing 'dod pa mi byed la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271b-0: bsam gtan byed pa rnams @271b kyis smad par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271b-1: rtag tu las gnas skyon ni 'di dag yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271b-2: 'khor ba'i las la mngon par brtson pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271b-3: thar pa las ni rgyang ring bcings par gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271b-4: de ni yul 'khor zas la mi rigs spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271b-5: nyes pa 'di dag las la chags pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271b-6: rtag tu dngos po dag ni len par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271b-7: yongs su 'dzin pa la ni dga' mi bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271b-8: nor med nor ni don du gnyer bar byed; ;nyes pa 'di dag las la chags pa'i yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271b-9: khyim du rgyu ba dag ni chags par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271b-10: 'du 'dzin dga' bas thams cad 'jig par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271b-11: gzeb kyi nang du bya bcug bzhin du 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271b-12: nyes pa 'di dag las la chags pa'i yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271b-13: khyim pa'i las la de rtag mya ngan byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271b-14: yongs su gdungs par gyur kyang yid mi 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271b-15: nam yang tshig ni btsun par mi 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271b-16: nyes pa 'di dag las dga' ba'i yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271b-17: bla mas bskul na dga' blo mi bde zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271b-18: rjes su bstan pa mthun par 'dzin mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271b-19: de ni myur du tshul khrims nyams par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271b-20: nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271b-21: khyim na gnas pa'i las rnams rtag sems pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271b-22: de ni rtag tu 'dod par 'gyur ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271b-23: bsam gtan dang ni spong ba de mi byed; ;nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271b-24: de yi 'dod chags shas ni che bar skye //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271b-25: de ni ro bro rnams la chags shing zhe na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:271b-26: de ni ngan ngon tsam gyis dga' mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272a-1: pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272a-2: de ni 'khor mang phal cher dgar 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272a-3: de nyams na ni shin tu sdug bsngal 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272a-4: de ni bong bu bzhin du lang long 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272a-5: nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272a-6: de sems rtag tu gnod sems ldan par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272a-7: las rnams 'phel zhing zad par mi 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272a-8: sred pa'i 'khri shing dag gis dam du bcings //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272a-9: nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272a-10: de ni rtag tu bla ma rnams mi bsten //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272a-11: phyogs 'dod khyim pa la ni sten par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272a-12: tshul khrims gnas pa dag la'ang phrag dog byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272a-13: nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272a-14: nyin dang mtshan du sems gzhan med par ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272a-15: zas dang gos la rgyun du sems par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272a-16: de ni rtag tu yon tan 'dod ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272a-17: nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272a-18: de ni 'jig rten pa yi bya ba 'dri //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272a-19: rigs pa min pa'i smra ba rnams la dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272a-20: rigs pa'i smra la de ni dga' mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272a-21: nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272a-22: sdom brtson rnams la de ni rtag tu gshe /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272a-23: dbang phyug nyes pas de dag nges tshar gcod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272a-24: mi sdug las rnams mngon par 'du byed de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272a-25: nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272a-26: de ni rtag tu gzhan gyi skyon rtog cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272a-27: bdag la yod pa'i skyon rnams mi mthong la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272b-0: yon tan ldan pa @272b rnams la 'khrul pa tshol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272b-1: nyes pa 'di dag las dga' ba'i yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272b-2: byis pa de ni gzhan gyis myur du brnyas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272b-3: de ni pha rol dag la chos ston tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272b-4: blo nyams pas na mngon par shes mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272b-5: nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272b-6: gnod 'gyur nyes pa 'di dag mthong nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272b-7: las ngan dag la su zhig dga' bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272b-8: dpa' bo dag ni rtag tu las mchog byed; ;byis pa gang yin chud ni gson mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272b-9: lan stong brjod kyang tshig gcig mi 'dzin pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272b-10: de ni blo can dag gis spyo ba yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272b-11: gang zhig las ngan dag ni byed pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272b-12: dam pa dag gis de ltar rtag tu smad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272b-13: de lta bas na mkhas mis de rtag tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272b-14: las ngan dag ni rnam par spangs nas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272b-15: thub dbang rnams kyis rtag tu bsngags pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272b-16: bzang po'i las rnams gang yin de dag bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272b-19: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi mchog yongs su spangs nas las ngan pa rtsom pa de dag ni shes rab shin tu chung zhing shes rab kyis dman par 'gyur ba lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272b-20: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:272b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:273a-0: ji skad smras pa de bzhin @273a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:273a-1: te; byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi mchog yongs su spangs nas las ngan pa rtsom pa de dag ni shes rab shin tu chung zhing shes rab kyis dman par 'gyur ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:273a-3: gzhan yang khyod mos par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:273a-5: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag la sbyor ba med cing bsam gtan med la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:273a-6: spong ba med cing 'don pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:273a-7: mang du thos pa yongs su tshol ba med pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:273a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni bsam gtan dang spong bas phye ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:273a-10: ye shes kyis 'dus byas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:273a-11: ye shes kyis mnyam par bzhag pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:273a-12: brtson pas phye ba yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:273a-14: zhal ta byed pas phye ba ni ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:273a-15: 'di ltar zhal ta byed pa'i las de ni mi rigs pa la sbyor ba rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:273a-16: 'du byed la mngon par dga' ba rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:273a-17: 'jig rten pa'i bya bas spags pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:273a-18: byang chub sems dpas de la 'dod pa bskyed par mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:273a-20: gal te byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta byed pa la brtson pa rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di bkang na des ni nga mnyes par byas pa ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:273a-21: ri mor byas pa ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:273a-22: bkur sti byas pa ma yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:273b-0: gal te byang chub sems dpa' tha na pha @273b rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam 'dzin tam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:273b-4: 'chad pa des ni nga la bkur stir byas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:273b-5: bla mar byas; ri mor byas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:273b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni mang du thos pa las byung ba yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:273b-10: dngos por yongs su 'dzin pa las byung ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:273b-12: gal te byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta byed pa la brtson pas byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:273b-13: kha ton byed pa la brtson pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:273b-14: zhal ta byed pa'i spags pas spags par byed na bsod nams 'dod pa des ni bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po chen po bskyed par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:273b-15: las kyi sgrib pa yang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:273b-17: bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi gsum po gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni shes rab las byung ba'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:273b-19: de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' zhal te byed pa la brtson pas byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang kha ton byed pa la brtson pa'i bar chad mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:273b-20: 'dzam bu'i gling 'di zhal ta byed pas yongs su gang bar 'gyur ba'i zhal ta byed pa de dag thams cad kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:273b-21: kha ton byed pa la brtson pa gcig la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:274a-0: @274a *// byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:274a-1: kha ton byed pa la brtson pa 'dzam bu gling gang ba snyed kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' nang du yang dag 'jog la brtson pa gcig la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:274a-2: de ltar byas na de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su yi rang ba dang gnang ba yin te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:274a-4: gang zhig shes rab spyod pa la mos nas rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni tshad med par skyes par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:274a-6: 'di ltar shes rab kyi las de ni dka' ba'i las dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:277a-0: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa lang @277a *//

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:278b-8: de'i phyir khyod kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:278b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:278b-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:278b-11: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:278b-12: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:278b-16: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te; bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:278b-17: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:278b-18: lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:278b-19: 'dus pa nyi shu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs so ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:278b-20: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-007:278b-22: zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
